name: TelePod (old game)
description:
Shoot a "telepod" and then teleport to it at any time.

Also, view it from above at any time, to judge where it is and accurately teleport.

Solve puzzles, by platforming, avoiding lasers and (sometimes invisible) spikes, leaving it places to surpass hazards, get to doors before they close and spy on areas and pressing buttons

made last year
